title: 27Police raid on Small-Town Newspaper sees $3M payout & apology. They also raided the home of its pu
content:
27 Police raid on Small-Town Newspaper sees $3M payout & apology. They also raided the home of its publisher, Eric Meyer. Meyer’s 98-year-old mother and co-owner, Joan Meyer, collapsed and died the day after the raid — a loss her son attributed to the stress of the search. (nypost.com) posted 1 hour ago by rdvs34283 3 comments award share report block Police raid on small-town paper sees $3M payout, apology: 'Press has basically been under assault' Officials in Marion County, Kansas, have agreed to pay more than $3 million and issue a formal apology over a 2023 police raid on a small-town newspaper. nypost.com
